game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the dense jungle and discover the lost temple to retrieve the artifact.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary artifact

task.description: Use your survival skills to traverse the dense forest and reach the ruins.
Solve the puzzles at the entrance of the lost temple to gain entry.
Battle the guardians and locate the hidden chamber where the artifact is kept.
